Deeper neural network

```python def initialize_parameters_deep(layer_dims): np.random.seed(3) parameters = {} L = len(layer_dims) for l in range(1, L): parameters[‘W’ + str(l)] = np.random.randn(layer_dims[l],layer_dims[l-1])*0.01 parameters[‘b’ + str(l)] = np.zeros((layer_dims[l],1)) return parameters
